name: Girl and Witch Labyrinths
description:
Girl and Witch: Labyrinth of flowers

Amazing adventure in the maze!

Flowery labyrinths are full of pink crystals. They are guarded by an evil witch with her servants: rams, cockerels, crows and mice. A girl called Alice – can run fast, is nimble and aims to defeat the evil witch.

A fast and simple game, in a fairytale atmosphere.
